snippet: The agreement came nearly two years after the network lost the rights to air the United States Open to Fox.
abstract: NBC wins rights to carry British Open for 12-year period beginning in 2017, paying at least $50 million for rights; contract was essential victory for network that lost rights to the United States Open, its only golf major, nearly two years earlier.
lead_paragraph: The agreement came nearly two years after the network lost the rights to air the United States Open to Fox.

headline.main: NBC Announces 12-Year Deal to Televise the British Open
headline.print_headline: NBC Regains Major Foothold With Rights to British Open
